reviewText: Very nicely done video with the old fashioned classical full animation style.

I rented this movie when my 12 year old daughter was only 2 or 3 years old and my whole family still loves it!  It's very funny and has adult humor as well as "kidstuff."  Of course, I may just be a child at heart...  If you want to be, buy this one.  You won't be sorry.  It's a keeper!
